MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CH48 postcode area of West Kirby.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:57AM. We have unconfirmed reports of damage to our equipment and we suspect that your property is affected by this. Our next available engineer will attend site to confirm this report and our team will work to get your power supply back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:02AM on 15th March 2021.
